data.system_settings: iPhone XS Max, iOS 12.2 Dev Beta 5
data.short_description: [iPhone X/XR/XS/XS Max] 'Click here to change your email' button is inside safe area
data.steps_to_repro: - Create and log into a new account which requires verification - Ensure that the sent verification email screen appears - Observe the 'Click here to change your email' button at the bottom
